p: Subsequent small randomised placebo-controlled clinical trials in critical limb ischaemia showed favourable results of intramuscular autologous bone marrow-derived MSC therapy compared with standard care in patients with non-healing ulcers. 29 30 MSC injection was more effective than mononuclear cell (MNCs) injection in critical limb ischaemia and non-healing ulcers of patients with diabetes, which confirms results from preclinical studies. 31 32
